overview: Craig DeGeorge and 'Luscious' Johnny V host this unique look at the story of Ken Patera and his journey to redemption in WWE. Witness Patera in action against the likes of Harley Race, The Honky Tonk Man, and many more in this Home Video Classic!
tagline: Craig DeGeorge and 'Luscious' Johnny V host this unique look at the story of Ken Patera and his journey to redemption in WWE. Witness Patera in action against the likes of Harley Race, The Honky Tonk Man, and many more in this Home Video Classic!
title: The Ken Patera Story
